item.description:
St. Patty's Corned Beef & Cabbage dinner
To benefit the Palmer Knights of Columbus Scholarship Fund
St. Thomas Parish Center, 1076 Thorndike Street, Palmer, MA
$10 donation per person - pay at the door

Saturday March 13th, 6:00pm

Event:
The Palmer Council #376 of the Knights of Columbus is holding a Corned Beef & Cabbage dinner for the benefit of the Council Scholarship Fund. The food will be prepared by our very own Master Chef’s, and is the best around.

Organizer:
This event is being organized by Gary Ross.
http://www.meetup.com...

Entertainment:
The Quaboag Highlanders Pipes & Drums will be there for some traditional bagpipe music, followed by a wonderful show of step dancing by the students of the Claddagh School of Irish Dance.

Raffles:
3 raffles are being held; a bag raffle consisting of approximately 50 prizes from local establishments, a grand prize raffle, and a 50/50 cash raffle.

Tickets:
This event has been a sellout in the past so tickets will be held at the door in the names of those who RSVP a YES.

Seating:
Reserved seating will be made available to RSVP’s only.
No-Shows will be ridiculed, so please keep your RSVP up-to-date.

Beverages:
Beer, soda, & water will be sold. Coffee will be provided free of charge.

This event may be posted on other Meetup group so PLEASE RSVP WITH ONLY 1 GROUP!

After the dinner, we can go to the "Turtle Pond" bar on Rte 20. The band "Humble Street" will be playing. Haven't heard them, but heh, its live music!
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a reserved table for MEETUP members.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: St. Patty's Corned Beef & Cabbage dinner
